body:
Comment 1: 
Hello. From your report you are building an old version of Go on the newest version of
OSX and xcode. 

For various reasons this permutation has but rotted and is bi longer possible. 

Previously when this issue has arissen it was the suggestion that you use the most
recent version of go instead of a previous version. 

Can you please explain a little bit more about your requirements and if you are able to
use the current version of go instead.
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
